ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] A recap of the 6/6 patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: better yet, the ranger spell is resistable, thus when resisted instead of lowering hate, you go straight to the top.  56 ranger friend tried it and died
ygData.messageBody:
better yet, the ranger spell is resistable, thus when resisted instead of
lowering hate, you go straight to the top. 56 ranger friend tried it and
died instantly the first time. i believe he logged out very soon
thereafter.

Shada

> The new songs for hybrids referred to the Ranger hate lowering song I
> believe. Wasn't aware any other hybrids got more songs.
>
> Gotta love that one. They couldn't own up to the fact they
> screwed up by
> not increasing the ranger defensive stats, so to save face
> they give Rangers
> a spell to lower their hate list factor. So much for
> Symphonic Harmony
> being unique to bards.
